term_conditions1: Rallis India Limited, a company duly incorporated under the Companies Act, having its corporate office at 23rd Floor, Lodha Excelus, New Cuffe Parade, Off Eastern Freeway, Wadala, Mumbai 400037, Maharashtra, India,  is conducting this campaign which is being organized by and through its agency partner, Sproxil Brand Protection Solutions Private Limited, a company duly incorporated under the Companies Act, 1956 having its regd. Office at B-405, Lodha Supremus – II, Wagle Estate, Road No 22,Thane West, Thane - 400608, hereinafter together referred to as the “Organizers”.
term_conditions2: Please read the terms and conditions of the Offer before participating in it (hereinafter referred to as the “Offer”). By participating/availing this Offer, it is deemed that the participants/customers/ consumers (hereinafter collectively referred to as “Participant”) and/or Winners have irrevocably and unconditionally accepted all terms & conditions contained herein, including any/all amendment, modification, etc. made thereto without demur and shall throughout remain bound to them as under:
agreement1: i. Rallis Dhaanya Farmer Registration campaign will be run for a limited time period and is valid from 06th Dec, 2022 to 06th Aug, 2022. Registration of farmer will be closed on 06th Jul, 2022.
agreement2: ii. The Organizers reserves the right to announce the gifts/scheme in the middle of the campaign, substitute or change the scheme & gifts without prior notice. The Organizers also reserves the right to suspend or terminate the program any time it deems necessary.
agreement3: iii. Rewards shall not be exchangeable, transferable, redeemable or substituted for cash or otherwise, in all cases, whether in whole or part. Rewards once delivered cannot be returned or cancelled.
agreement4: iv. Dispute if any should be referred to the Organizers and decision of the Organizers regarding the reward will be final and binding.
agreement5: v. The Organizers reserves the right to cancel/amend the scheme and its terms & conditions without notice in the event of a catastrophe, war, civil or military disturbance, pandemic, act of God or any actual or anticipated breach of any applicable law or regulation or any other event outside the company’s control. Changes to the scheme will be notified to concerned parties as soon as possible by the Organizers.
agreement6: vi. Any activity by dealer/retailer/end-user/entrant which can be termed illegal by laws in India and/or by the Organizers shall be disqualified without notice to the dealer/retailer/end-user/entrant.
agreement7: vii. The Organizers reserves the right to decide and execute scheme dynamics, namely, minimum and maximum purchase value of Rallis India Limited goods, gifts, redemption method and partnering with 3rd party agencies to carry out the scheme in the market.
agreement8: viii. By accepting the Offer, Participants fully and unconditionally agree to abide by the terms and conditions, privacy policies & Opt-in for promotional communication. Organizer’s decision shall be final and binding in all matters related to the Offer is subject to all requirements set forth herein.
agreement9: ix. Nothing by way of terms and conditions of this Offer or otherwise shall be construed as an enticement for participating in the offer, buying or advertising of the product.
participate1: i. On the login page MDR will have language selection options of English, Hindi, Marathi & Gujarati all the content in the webpages will be shown accordingly.
participate2: ii. To login MDR has to enter his mobile no and confirm it by using OTP.
participate3: iii. Upon login, MDR Will be able to see his individual target and achievement till date.
participate4: iv. On the same page he will have a button to register a new farmer.
participate5: v. Clicking on this button will take him to the farmer registration page.
participate6: vi. MDR will enter famer details like name, mobile number, village, pin code, preferred retailer, land owned in Acre, crops they grow, land use for specific crop, company seeds they generally buy, Dhaanya brand seeds they uses & edge code of retailer.
participate7: vii. MDR will have two options to confirm the farmers registration by registration code (alphanumeric) or IVR.
participate8: viii. If the farmer says registration code, then the MDR will select the registration code option through which registration code SMS will be sent to farmer.
participate9: ix. MDR will take the registration code from farmer and enter in his registration page and submit to confirm the registration
participate10: x. If farmer says IVR then MDR will select the IVR option through which farmer will get a IVR call, asking his to press 1 to confirm his registration or 2 to reject.
participate11: xi. By confirming the registration farmer agrees for using WhatsApp to share the product content.

general_conditions1: i. The Participant understands and agrees that the selected Participant/ Winner(s) alone shall be entitled to prizes, subject to all terms and conditions mentioned herein, and furnishing of correct and complete details as indicated in Clauses 1(X) above (including but not limited to) in the prescribed manner and to the entire satisfaction of the Organizers.
general_conditions2: ii. The Offer will be promoted at the sole discretion of the Organizers.
general_conditions3: iii. The Participants hereby irrevocably authorize Organizers and their respective owners, affiliates, subsidiaries, associates and grants a royalty-free and perpetual right to use as per Organizers   discretion any and all data gathered during and/or after the Offers in respect of the Participant (including but not limited to name and photograph and other personal details) for the purpose of this Offer and or in any of its communications including marketing promotions along with or without Organizers brand and advertisements, social media, Organizers Platform or any other public domain.
general_conditions4: iv. The Participant/Winner(s) will be intimated on the mobile number provided by the Participant on the microsite. The decision of the management of Organizers in this regard shall be final & binding upon the Participant and/or the Winner(s), and the Participant/ Winner(s) hereby agree that no claims, disputes, etc. of any sort shall be raised against the Organizers.
general_conditions5: v. The prize can neither be exchanged nor redeemed for cash/ any non-monetary consideration nor it is transferable. In the event of non-availability or inability of Organizers to provide the exact prize for any reason whatsoever, the Organizers shall have the right to offer an alternative prize and the winning Participant shall accept the same without demur and shall not make any claim against the Organizers on any account.

general_conditions7: vii.
